俼字的基本解释

俼
yù
古同“鬻”。

俼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》余六切，入屋，以。］
亦作“俼1”。
(1)卖。
(2)引申为谋取私利而出卖。
(3)购买。
(4)炫耀；卖弄。
(5)通“育”。幼稚。
(6)通“育”。生育；养。
(7)用同“越”。超越。参见“鬻度”。
(8)通“俗”。
(9)姓。周有鬻熊，为文王师，封为楚祖。见《史记·楚世家》。
[②]［zhōu］
［《集韻》之六切，入屋，章。］
亦作“俼2”。
(1)同“粥”。
(2)见“鬻2鬻”。
(3)通“煮”。

俼字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　俼； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页106第23
俗鬻字。

俼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
俼字的起名意思

暂无。

Yi
Basic explanation of words
Yi
yù
The ancient same "whole".
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yù］
["Guangyun" Yu Liuqie, enter the house, take. ]
Also known as "俼1".
(1) Sell.
(2) By extension, betrayed for personal gain.
(3) Purchase.
(4) Show off; show off.
(5) Through "education". naive.
(6) Through "education". Fertility; raise.
(7) Use the same "yue". Beyond. See "Sudden Degree".
(8) Popular "vulgar".
(9) Last name. Zhou Youxiong, as the master of Wenwang, was named the ancestor of Chu. See "Historical Records · Family of Chu".
[②]［zhōu］
[Six cuts of "Jiyun", entering the house, chapter. ]
Also known as "俼2".
(1) Same as "porridge".
(2) See "鬻2鬻".
(3) Pass "cook".
Yi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　俼; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 106 Page 23
Vulgar word.
